#summary commit rules specification.
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

This page describes the commit rules for this project. You must submitt to this rules, if you want to commit to this project.


= Details =

Each major change to this project must follow this rules.

This rules may change in time. Please stay tuned.

  # Create an Issue
  # Create a branch for the issue   
      /branches/issue_number_6 (e.g. brahches/issue_000212)
  # Make your modifications
  # Commit your modifications
  # Call for a code review
  # Your code will be merged in designates releases by an owner.
